title: César Seda
text: César Seda Pacheco Jr. (born January 17, 1986) is a Puerto Rican professional <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He currently has 28 wins and 3 losses, with 17 of those wins coming by <a href="knockout">knockout</a>. Seda currently fights in the <a href="Super%20bantamweight">Super bantamweight</a> division. Seda was the former <a href="International%20Boxing%20Organization">IBO</a> <a href="Flyweight">Flyweight</a> world champion, holding the title from 2009 to 2010. On December 14, 2013, Seda fought <a href="Leo%20Santa%20Cruz">Leo Santa Cruz</a> for the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Council">WBC</a> <a href="Super%20bantamweight">Super bantamweight</a> championship of the world. The title fight went the distance, with Santa Cruz defeating Seda by <a href="unanimous%20decision">unanimous decision</a>.
